title:
Determining PSL(2,11) Via A Same-size Conjugacy Class Set With Almost
  Distinct Conjugacy Class Sizes
authors: Mina Hemmati Tirabadi and Ali Iranmanesh
abstract:
In this paper we prove if G is a finite simple group with same-size conjugacy
class set, U(G) = {1, rq, 4rq, 8pq, 8pr}, where p, q, r are prime numbers, then
G is isomorphic to PSL(2, l), where l is prime greater than 7. In particular,
if this group with previous conditions has at most two conjugacy classes of
each size, then G is isomorphic to PSL(2, 11).
